thread.title: 31. Scared to Be Lonely - Martin Garrix & Dua Lipa
thread.title_full: 31. Scared to Be Lonely - Martin Garrix & Dua Lipa

title: 31. Scared to Be Lonely - Martin Garrix & Dua Lipa
text: I feel like all these songs sound the same. Biography Born: May 14, 1996 in Amsterdam, Netherlands Genre: Dance Years Active: '10s Part of the explosion of Dutch EDM DJs who emerged during the 2012-2013 season, Martin Garrix kicked off his career in a high-profile way, first landing on the dance charts with his 2012 remix of Christina Aguilera's "Your Body." Born Martijn Garritsen, the then-16-year-old DJ spent 2012 remixing Aguilera, signing with Spinnin' Records, and releasing the "BFAM" single in collaboration with Julian Jordan. In 2013 he released his solo single "Animals," which hit number one in the U.K. and reached the... Top Albums and Songs by Martin Garrix 1.
